ai-mil3.2.3:1.2_0: “Which one of those whose wisdom has arisen in him?”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.3_0: “Great king, knowledge has arisen in him.”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.5_0: “Great king, knowledge of wisdom is just a sacrifice.”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.6_0: “But sir, what does that knowledge arise for you, so why would they possibly think of them?”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.7_0: “Where wouldn’t be able to lift all at once?”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.8_0: “Sir, where may they be released from?”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.9_0: “Great king, which among you’ve previously been despiseed, since they’re not previously considered to join the various different realms. They’re never previously known as before.”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.10_0: “Why don’t I be released from all?”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.11_0: “But because they say that nothing is impermanent, suffering, and perishable, they don’t know that it’s impermanent, or that it’s not.”
ai-mil3.2.3:1.13_0: “Great king, a knowledge arose in me.”
ai-mil3.2.3:2.2_0: “Great king, suppose a person was to light a lamp in the dark of night. They’d light it down, so that light appeared in darkness.
ai-mil3.2.3:2.3_0: In the same way, right knowledge arises conditioned by delusion.”
ai-mil3.2.3:3.2_0: “Great king, which is impermanent and suffering ceases. Rather, it’s impermanent, that’s what they say.”
ai-mil3.2.3:4.1_0: “Since it is the case of a dragon, that knows it is impermanent, that the Sakyans of their own wisdom, because of that it ceases!” But that you don’t know it or see it with penetrating wisdom.
ai-mil3.2.3:4.2_0: “Great king, suppose a person were to get an exhausted without first getting it to gather with a stick. Then, when they want, they’d stir it, and gather it with a stick.
ai-mil3.2.3:4.3_0: In the same way, having known that the own insight is impermanent, that which ceases and stops as impermanent, that ceases.”
ai-mil3.2.3:5.2_0: “Great king, when the eastern countries, the five-footed nymphs, the water jars of them set up water them in the eastern gate, and the fire worship you?”
ai-mil3.2.3:5.3_0: “No, sir, what do they want? What may they strive?”
ai-mil3.2.3:5.4_0: “Great king, the five faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom are faculty of faith.
ai-mil3.2.3:5.5_0: Living in the same way you should see like this.
ai-mil3.2.3:5.6_0: Still the sacred fire is burned by fire.
ai-mil3.2.3:5.7_0: While the fire worships, the five faculties are swept away by the five faculties, the five powers, and the defilements come to be.
ai-mil3.2.3:5.8_0: In the same way, having known that the own insight is impermanent, that which ceases and stops as impermanent, that ceases.”
ai-mil3.2.3:6.2_0: “Great king, when they have eaten and drunk on the fierce, the fifths, and those five hundred dove-footed nymphs, which would they make a ran away?”
ai-mil3.2.3:6.4_0: “Great king, the five faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom should be seen with the faculty of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-mil3.2.3:6.5_0: The pretext may be seed like this.
ai-mil3.2.3:6.6_0: How should you see only as sick person.
ai-mil3.2.3:6.7_0: Even as you fierceiving, downcast, the patient, and leaning on dry land, you get sick, and the five faculties. And the five powers don’t get tired, falling apart, and falling apart.
ai-mil3.2.3:6.8_0: In the same way, having known that the own insight is impermanent, that which ceases and stops as impermanent, that ceases.”
ai-mil3.2.3:7.2_0: “Great king, when you plunge into battle, it would be appropriate for you to plunge into battle, the hairs and beard, dressed in battle, and plunge into battle? What can I possibly to them?”
ai-mil3.2.3:7.3_0: “No, sir, what do you have broken?”
ai-mil3.2.3:7.4_0: “Great king, the five faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom are faculty.
ai-mil3.2.3:7.5_0: You should regard battle as instructed in battle.
ai-mil3.2.3:7.6_0: are to be honored like this.
ai-mil3.2.3:7.7_0: Even as you scratch the five faculties in this way for control the faculties, terror, and danger, and violences, and not once again.
ai-mil3.2.3:7.8_0: In the same way, having known that the own insight is impermanent, that which ceases and stops as impermanent, that ceases.”
ai-mil3.2.3:9.1_0: The third knowledge and wisdom is finished.
